domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @Amy_Siskind @joncoopertweets Coronavirus didn't go away just because everyone got tired of it. Other countries eradicated it because they had strong leadership, a national system for testing and tracking, and a willingness to put the lives of others before their comfort. We failed. We continue to fail.
